creator: Peri Admin
descriptionHtml:
KEY FEATURES :
• EXPENSE MANAGEMENT: Enables users to submit expenses in different currencies and expense categories by uploading bills and receipts
• EXPENSE POLICY MANAGEMENT: Aids in defining expense category-wise budgets, setting base currencies, and assign them to the appropriate user levels
• APPROVAL WORKFLOW MANAGEMENT: Optimizes department wise workflows related to expense approval and reimbursement
• TRIP REQUEST MANAGEMENT: Streamlines the process of raising travel requests, approval of such requests, and the disbursement of advances whenever necessary
• INTELLIGENT BUSINESS DASHBOARDS: Creates user-friendly graphical and tabular reports status by month, Expense Summary by category, and Report summary by status
• ACCESSIBLE ONLINE OR THROUGH APP: Employees can access PERI from anywhere and at any time using any internet enabled device or by downloading the PERI app (available for iOS and Android)

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1) Receipt Download for Submitter
2) Bug fixes
3) UI improvement

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Provision of Auto Renewal Tab in subscription details page
- Wallet Integration for Finance Role
- Onboarding of BancTec Users to Peri
- Pricing Flow Integration with Cash Free for India
- The permissible amount to be replace with payable amount in the expense approval report status
- In mileage category change the Policy Amount to as Mileage Rate
- New Pricing Plan Integration
- Addition of Home Icon and Language Drop Down on Sign Up form

.Two factor authentication
·Provision to enter 7 digit amount in the Cash advance/Trip Request fields
.Provision to view and edit mobile number along with list of country flags and code in profile page

.Added Employee Id in all list pages
.Added Employee Id in download report
.These realse brings bug Fixes
